question: The "Lake Mweru" is located on the border between which two nations?
option4: Democratic Republic of Congo and Zambia
answer: Democratic Republic of Congo and Zambia
explanation: Lake Mweru is located in the border between the Democratic Republic of Congo and Zambia. It is a rift valley-freshwater lake on the Congo River. Its upstream forms the Luapula River and its downstream forms Luvua River. It is a part of the Lake Mweru-Luapula graben of the East African Rift.
